ranks.rankDescription: Feeling Lucky? You should! Each hit in V.A.T.S. has a chance of filling your Critical meter.
Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has an even better chance of filling your Critical meter.
Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has a very good chance of filling your Critical meter.
Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has an excellent chance of filling your Critical meter.
